channel.title: [317] Socket Exception
channel.description:
Hi, I've been working on a Winterlove-based source and when I log out, I get this error:
[code=java] java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: socket write error at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite(SocketOutputStream.java:92) at java.net.SocketOutputStream.write(SocketOutputStream.java:136) at ClientHandler.run(ClientHandler.java:612) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [/code]
It's an error stating the program is still trying to write after the connection was broken. The exact line that's causing the error is:
[code=java]out.write(buffer, offset, numBytesInBuffer);[/code]
But I can't figure out how to fix it, any ideas?
Seething

item.title: [317] Socket Exception
item.dc:creator: @Seething Seething
item.description:
@Seething wrote:

Hi, I’ve been working on a Winterlove-based source and when I log out, I get this error:

java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: socket write error
        at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite0(Native Method)
        at java.net.SocketOutputStream.socketWrite(SocketOutputStream.java:92)
        at java.net.SocketOutputStream.write(SocketOutputStream.java:136)
        at ClientHandler.run(ClientHandler.java:612)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

It’s an error stating the program is still trying to write after the connection was broken. The exact line that’s causing the error is:

out.write(buffer, offset, numBytesInBuffer);

But I can’t figure out how to fix it, any ideas?

Seething
